compliant.section: To contact You by email, telephone calls, SMS, or other equivalent forms of electronic communication, such as a mobile application's push notifications regarding updates or informative communications related to the functionalities, products or contracted services, including the security updates, when necessary or reasonable for their implementation.
compliant.article numbers: Article 6(1)(b) - processing is necessary for the performance of a contract
compliant.legal provisions: This section is compliant if the contact is related to existing contracts and necessary for their performance, such as updates or security information.

non_compliant.section: To contact You by email, telephone calls, SMS, or other equivalent forms of electronic communication, such as a mobile application's push notifications regarding updates or informative communications related to the functionalities, products or contracted services, including the security updates, when necessary or reasonable for their implementation.
non_compliant.article numbers: Article 6(1)(a) - consent of the data subject
non_compliant.legal provisions: If the contact goes beyond what is necessary for contract performance, such as marketing or promotional content, explicit consent is required.
non_compliant.amend: This section would be compliant if it specified that consent is obtained for marketing or non-essential communications.

non_compliant.section: To provide You with news, special offers and general information about other goods, services and events which we offer that are similar to those that you have already purchased or enquired about unless You have opted not to receive such information.
non_compliant.article numbers: Article 21(2) & Recital 47 - Right to object to direct marketing
non_compliant.legal provisions: While offering similar products/services based on past purchases is permitted, the wording 'opted not to receive' suggests an opt-out mechanism. GDPR requires explicit consent (opt-in) for direct marketing.
non_compliant.amend: Change 'opted not to receive' to 'expressly consented to receive' and ensure a clear and separate consent request for marketing communications is implemented.
